title: Talm devouring enemy while ally is using Ult causes entire party's client to crash
body:
During my last two games, i have managed to crash everyone's game twice. From what has been observed, if Talk has three stacks on an enemy and an ally uses their ultimate on them, but Talm Kench trys to devour the enemy, everyone gets disconnected and cannot resume play for a while.

During our first game, Malzahar was suppressing a Darius, and I attempted to Devour the Darius. He died before i could eat him, but the game decided to walk me up to their fountain and upon arrival everyone was Disconnected. We could not resume the game as "The client is unable to connect to the Server" I was only able to reconnect during the post game results screen.

During the second game, a Zyra had used her Ultimate, however a Yasuo had managed to knock her up and was in the process of using his Ultimate. I attempted to devour her midair and the attempt failed. Talm just stood there and did nothing, followed by our party being Disconnected.

replies.body:
Hey there,

That definitely sounds like a serious bug if its reproducible, however you've posted it on the wrong board. This is for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.

You'll want to head over to the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board on NA and make a thread there, please read the "[How to report a Game Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug)" thread before posting to ensure your report is up to scratch.
